## Tender Notice

### Title and Reference Number

* **English Title:** Snow and Ice Control Services for Official Residences in Quebec
* **French Title:** Services de déneigement et de déglaçage pour les résidences officielles du Québec
* **Reference Number:** cb-163-63847145
* **Amendment Number:** 7
* **Solicitation Number:** ES041
* **Publication Date:** 2023-09-25
* **Tender Closing Date:** 2023-10-13T15:00:00

### Tender Description

The National Capital Commission (NCC) solicits services from experienced Contractors to provide snow and ice control services for two (2) official residences in Quebec. The contract spans a period of three (3) years, from November 1st, 2023, to May 31st, 2026, with two one-year options to extend at the same terms and conditions.

### Basis of Selection

Contract award will be based on the responsive offer with the lowest total evaluated price.

### Contact Information

* **Name:** Emilie Scheckman, Sr. Contract Officer
* **Email:** emilie.scheckman@ncc-ccn.ca
* **Phone:** (343) 552-5976

### Tender Information

The tender notice is available for download at https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/20523/es041---snow-and-ice-control-services-official-residences-quebec.pdf (English) and https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/20523/es041---services-de-deneigement-et-de-deglacage-residences-officielles-quebec.pdf (French).

### Enquiries and Submissions

Enquiries can be submitted in writing to the Sr. Contract Officer, Emilie Scheckman, at emilie.scheckman@ncc-ccn.ca. Please direct all communications related to this proposal to the Sr. Contract Officer named above. Non-compliance with this requirement may result in disqualification of a proposal.

Submissions must be made by email to Bids-soumissions@ncc-ccn.ca, including the tender file number ES041. The Commission's official Government Electronic Tendering Service website is available at Tender opportunities | CanadaBuys.
